Pedagogy

A balanced mix of asynchronous sessions comprising videos and synchronous interactive sessions, along with projects and case discussions for a hands-on experience. During each module, the following methods of teaching are adopted.

  • Videos
  • Campus Connect Read more
  • Webinars
Campus Connect

A unique learning element of this programme is the opportunity to interact with the course instructors in person at IITM and IIMB campuses at least once during the run of each module. In addition, in each course, a Teaching Assistant (a subject matter expert) will guide you through the online learning journey through email and online discussion forums.
